scripts.upload-html: aws s3 sync out s3://articles.calloftheforest.com  --exclude '*' --include='*.html' --acl=public-read --cache-control max-age=600,public
scripts.upload-assets: aws s3 sync out s3://articles.calloftheforest.com   --exclude='*.html' --acl=public-read --cache-control max-age=8380800,public
scripts.deploy: yarn build && yarn export && yarn upload
